T02TD2273E:122a-1: do ha ko sha n'a ma ma h'a mu dra au ba de sha /
T02TD2273E:122a-3: do ha mdzod ces bya ba phyag rgya chen po'i man ngag dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2273E:122a-4: lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes chos kyi sku bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2273E:122a-5: ji ltar dngos dang dngos med snang stong dang //
T02TD2273E:122a-6: rgyu dang mi rgyu g-yo dang mi g-yo ba //
T02TD2273E:122a-7: thams cad ma lus nam mkha'i rang bzhin las //
T02TD2273E:122a-8: dus rnams kun du nam yang g-yo ba med //
T02TD2273E:122a-9: nam mkha' nam mkha' zhes ni rab brjod kyang //
T02TD2273E:122a-10: nam mkha'i ngo bo cir yang grub pa med //
T02TD2273E:122a-11: yod dang med dang yod min med min dang //
T02TD2273E:122a-12: de las gzhan du'ang mtshan pa'i yul las 'das //
T02TD2273E:122a-13: de ltar nam mkha' sems dang chos nyid la //
T02TD2273E:122a-14: tha dad cung zad yod pa ma yin te //
T02TD2273E:122a-15: tha dad ming ni glo bur btags pa tsam //
T02TD2273E:122a-16: de la don med brdzun gyi tshig tu zad //
T02TD2273E:122a-17: chos rnams thams cad rang gi sems yin te //
T02TD2273E:122a-18: sems las ma gtogs chos gzhan rdul tsam med //
T02TD2273E:122a-19: gang gis gdod nas sems med rtogs pa yis //
T02TD2273E:122a-20: dus gsum rgyal ba'i dgongs pa dam pa rnyed //
T02TD2273E:122a-21: chos kyi za ma tog ces yongs su gdags //
T02TD2273E:122a-22: de yang log pa'i chos gzhan ma yin te //
T02TD2273E:122a-23: gzod nas lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD2273E:122b-0: de yi de nyid bstan du @122b yod min te //
T02TD2273E:122b-1: brjod du med pas sus kyang go ba med //
T02TD2273E:122b-2: gal te bdag po yod na nor yod de //
T02TD2273E:122b-3: ye nas bdag med de la ci zhig yod //
T02TD2273E:122b-4: sems yod gyur na chos kun yod rigs te //
T02TD2273E:122b-5: sems med pa la chos zhig su yis rtogs //
T02TD2273E:122b-6: sems dang chas su snang ba thams cad ni ;
T02TD2273E:122b-7: ; btsal na mi rnyed tshol mkhan gong nas med //
T02TD2273E:122b-8: med pa dus gsum ma skyes mi 'gag pas //
T02TD2273E:122b-9: de nyid gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa ni //
T02TD2273E:122b-10: rang bzhin bde ba chen po'i gnas lugs yin //
T02TD2273E:122b-11: de phyir snang ba thams cad chos kyi sku //
T02TD2273E:122b-12: 'gro ba sems can rnams ni sangs rgyas nyid //
T02TD2273E:122b-13: 'du byed las kun ye nas chos kyi dbyings //
T02TD2273E:122b-14: btags pa'i chos rnams ri bong rva dang 'dra //
T02TD2273E:122b-15: kye ma nyi ma sprin bral 'od zer kun khyab kyang //
T02TD2273E:122b-16: mig med rnams la mun pa rnams su snang //
T02TD2273E:122b-17: lhan cig skyes pas kun la khyab gyur kyang //
T02TD2273E:122b-18: rmongs pa dag la de nyid shin tu ring ;
T02TD2273E:122b-19: /'gro ba rnams kyis sems med ma rtogs pas //
T02TD2273E:122b-20: btags pa'i sems kyis sems nyid rab tu bcings //
T02TD2273E:122b-21: ji ltar gdon gyis brlabs pa'i smyon ba dag / dbang med don med sdug bsngal byed pa ltar //
T02TD2273E:122b-22: dngos 'dzin rnam rtog gdon chen zin pa yi //
T02TD2273E:122b-23: skye bo don med sdug bsngal 'ba' zhig byed //
T02TD2273E:122b-24: kha cig blo yi dbye bas rmongs rnams bcings //
T02TD2273E:122b-25: bdag po khyim du bzhag nas gzhan du tshol //
T02TD2273E:122b-26: kha cig gzugs brnyan dag la gdon du 'dzin //
T02TD2273E:122b-27: kha cig rtsa ba bor nas lo 'dab 'breg / ji ltar byas kyang bslus ba ma tshor ro //
T02TD2273E:122b-28: kye ho bus pa rnams kyis de nyid ma rig kyang //
T02TD2273E:122b-29: de nyid ngang las g-yos med nga yis rtogs //
T02TD2273E:122b-30: nga yis nga yir thog mtha' shes gyur pas //
T02TD2273E:122b-31: nga yis nga mthong rang nyid gcig pur lus //
T02TD2273E:122b-32: gcig po nyid la bltas pas gcig ma mthong //
T02TD2273E:122b-33: mthong bya mthong byed bral bas brjod du med //
T02TD2273E:122b-34: brjod du med pa su yis go bar 'gyur //
T02TD2273E:122b-35: gnyug ma'i yid la gang tshe sbyangs gyur pa //
T02TD2273E:122b-36: de tshe ri khrod nga yi rtogs par 'jug / seng ge'i 'o ma snod ngan phal par min //
T02TD2273E:122b-37: ji ltar nags na seng ge'i nga ro yis //
T02TD2273E:122b-38: ri dags phra mo thams cad skrag gyur kyang //
T02TD2273E:123a-0: seng phrug rnams ni dga' bas brgyug pa @123a * //
T02TD2273E:123a-2: / gdod nas ma skyes bde chen 'di bstan pas //
T02TD2273E:123a-3: rmongs pa log rtog can rnams skrag gyur kyang //
T02TD2273E:123a-4: skal ldan rab tu dga' bas spu zing byed //
T02TD2273E:123a-5: kye ho ma yengs sems kyi rang gis rang la ltos //
T02TD2273E:123a-6: rang gi de nyid rang gis rtogs gyur na //
T02TD2273E:123a-7: yengs pa'i sems kyang phyag rgya chen por 'char //
T02TD2273E:123a-8: mtshan ma rang grol bde ba chen po'i ngang //
T02TD2273E:123a-9: rmi lam dag gi bde dang sdug bsngal kun //
T02TD2273E:123a-10: sad pa'i dus na rang bzhin med pa'i phyir //
T02TD2273E:123a-11: re dang dogs pa'i bsam pas kun bslang nas //
T02TD2273E:123a-12: dgag dang sgrub pa'i bsam pa su zhig byed ;
T02TD2273E:123a-13: /'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa'i chos rnams kun //
T02TD2273E:123a-14: de nyid mthong bas rang bzhin med pa'i phyir //
T02TD2273E:123a-15: re dang dogs pa'i blo ni zad gyur pas //
T02TD2273E:123a-16: spang dang blang ba'i 'bad rtsol ci byar yod //
T02TD2273E:123a-17: snang grags thams cad sgyu ma smig rgyu dang //
T02TD2273E:123a-18: gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs dngos po mtshan ma med //
T02TD2273E:123a-19: sgyu mar snang mkhan sems nyid nam mkha'i ste //
T02TD2273E:123a-20: mtha' bral dbus mar sus kyang shes mi 'gyur //
T02TD2273E:123a-21: gang g'a la sogs chu klung sna tshogs pa //
T02TD2273E:123a-22: ba tsha can gyi rgya mtshor ro gcig ltar //
T02TD2273E:123a-23: btags pa'i sems dang sems byung sna tshogs kun //
T02TD2273E:123a-24: chos kyi dbyings su ro gcig shes par byos //
T02TD2273E:123a-25: gang zhig nam mkha'i khams ni yongs btsal kyang //
T02TD2273E:123a-26: mtha' dang dbus med mthong ba yongs su 'gag / de bzhin sems dang chos ni yongs btsal bas //
T02TD2273E:123a-27: snying po rdul tsam rnyed par ma gyur te //
T02TD2273E:123a-28: yongs su tshol ba'i sems kyang mi dmigs pas //
T02TD2273E:123a-29: ci yang ma mthong ba nyid de mthong yin //
T02TD2273E:123a-30: ji ltar gzings la 'phur ba'i bya rog ni //
T02TD2273E:123a-31: phyogs rnams bskor zhing slar yang de ru 'bab //
T02TD2273E:123a-32: 'dod pa'i sems kyis bstan pa'i rjes bcad kyang //
T02TD2273E:123a-33: dang po'i sems nyid gnyug ma nyid du 'bab //
T02TD2273E:123a-34: rkyen gyis mi 'gul re ba'i yi chad pa //
T02TD2273E:123a-35: dogs pa'i skugs sa zhigs pas rdo rje sems //
T02TD2273E:123a-36: rtsa ba chod pa'i sems nyid nam mkha' 'dra //
T02TD2273E:123a-37: sgom du med pas yid la mi bya ste //
T02TD2273E:123a-38: tha mal shes pa rang lugs gnyug ma la //
T02TD2273E:123b-0: bcos ma'i dmigs @123b pa dag gis mi bslad de //
T02TD2273E:123b-1: rang bzhin dag pa'i sems la bcos mi dgos //
T02TD2273E:123b-2: ma bzung ma btang rang dga' nyid du zhog / gal te ma rtogs blo la sgom rgyu med //
T02TD2273E:123b-3: rtogs pa can la bsgom bya sgom byed med //
T02TD2273E:123b-4: ji ltar nam mkhas nam mkha' dmigs su med //
T02TD2273E:123b-5: de ltar stong pas stong pa sgom du med //
T02TD2273E:123b-6: gnyis med shes pas chu dang 'o ma ltar //
T02TD2273E:123b-7: sna tshogs ro gcig bde chen rgyun chad med //
T02TD2273E:123b-8: 'di ltar dus gsum rnam pa thams cad du //
T02TD2273E:123b-9: yid la bya ba med cing ma bral gnyug ma'i ngang //
T02TD2273E:123b-10: de nyid skyong la sgom zhes tha snyad gdags //
T02TD2273E:123b-11: rlung ni mi bzung yid ni mi bcing bar //
T02TD2273E:123b-12: ma bcos shes pa bu chung lta bur zhog / dran rtog byung na de nyid rang la ltos //
T02TD2273E:123b-13: chu dang rlabs gnyis tha dad ma rtogs shig / yid la mi byed phyag rgya chen po la //
T02TD2273E:123b-14: sgom rgyu rdul tsam med pas mi bsgom ste //
T02TD2273E:123b-15: sgom med don dang 'bral med sgom pa'i mchog / gnyis med lhan cig bde ba chen po'i ro //
T02TD2273E:123b-16: ji ltar chu la chu gzhag ro gcig ltar //
T02TD2273E:123b-17: ji bzhin ngang du de bzhin gnas pa'i tshe //
T02TD2273E:123b-18: dmigs 'dzin zhen pa'i yid ni rab tu zhi //
T02TD2273E:123b-20: gnyis med gnyug ma'i rnal 'byor gang de la //
T02TD2273E:123b-21: spang dang blang ba'i dngos po ci zhig yod //
T02TD2273E:123b-22: ngas ni chos kun ma btang bas //
T02TD2273E:123b-23: bu khyod 'di gyis bya ba mi smra'o //
T02TD2273E:123b-24: ji ltar nor bu de dngos med pa ltar //
T02TD2273E:123b-25: rnal 'byor spyod pa de dngos med pa ste //
T02TD2273E:123b-26: 'du byed sna tshogs cal col gang smras kyang //
T02TD2273E:123b-27: rnal 'byor blo ni gcig las mi 'da'o //
T02TD2273E:123b-28: gcig nyid na ni gcig kyang yod min pas //
T02TD2273E:123b-29: rnam pa sna tshogs rtsa ba bral gyur te //
T02TD2273E:123b-30: smyon pa bzhin du rtsis med yan pa la //
T02TD2273E:123b-31: byar med spyod pa bu chung bzhin du gnas //
T02TD2273E:123b-33: srid pa'i 'dam skyes padma lta bu'i sems //
T02TD2273E:123b-34: nyes pa gang gi gang la gos pa med //
T02TD2273E:123b-35: za zhing 'thung la gnyis sprod bde ba dang //
T02TD2273E:123b-36: gal te lus sems rab tu gdungs gyur dang //
T02TD2273E:123b-37: rnam pa sna tshogs gang la spyod gyur pa //
T02TD2273E:123b-38: gang gis ma bcings ma grol gos ba med //
T02TD2273E:123b-39: rtogs pa'i rang spyod rtsis med dang de nas //
T02TD2273E:124a-1: pa'i 'gro ba nyam thag mngon gyur tshe //
T02TD2273E:124a-2: mi bzod snying rje'i shugs kyis mchi ma 'byung //
T02TD2273E:124a-3: bdag gzhan bzlog nas phan pha nyid la 'jug / don la brtags na dmigs pa gsum bral bas //
T02TD2273E:124a-4: yang dag ma yin rmi lam sgyu 'dra ste //
T02TD2273E:124a-5: chags thogs bral bas dka' zhing skye med pa //
T02TD2273E:124a-6: sgyu ma mkhas pa sgyu ma'i don byed mtshungs //
T02TD2273E:124a-7: gdod nas dag pa nam mkha'i rang bzhin la //
T02TD2273E:124a-8: spangs dang thob pa'i dngos po 'ga' yang med //
T02TD2273E:124a-9: yid la byar med phyag rgya chen po ni //
T02TD2273E:124a-10: 'bras bu gang du'ang re ba ma byed cig / re ba'i sems ni gdod nas ma skyes pas //
T02TD2273E:124a-11: spangs dang thob pa'i dngos po ci zhig yod //
T02TD2273E:124a-12: gal te gang gis thob pa'i dngos po ci zhig yod //
T02TD2273E:124a-13: gal te gang gis thob pa'i dngos yod na //
T02TD2273E:124a-14: bstan pa'i phyag rgya rnam bzhis ci zhig byed //
T02TD2273E:124a-15: ji ltar ri dgas 'khrul pas gdungs pa yis//
T02TD2273E:124a-16: smig rgyu'i chu la rab tu brgyug pa ltar //
T02TD2273E:124a-17: rmongs pa gang zhig 'dod pas rab gdungs pas //
T02TD2273E:124a-18: ji ltar 'bad kyang slar ni ring bar 'gyur //
T02TD2273E:124a-19: ye nas ma skyes rang bzhin rnam dag pas //
T02TD2273E:124a-20: de las khyad par cung zad yod min te //
T02TD2273E:124a-21: btags pa'i yid ni dbyings su dag gyur pa //
T02TD2273E:124a-22: de la rdo rje 'chang zhes btags pa tsam //
T02TD2273E:124a-23: ji ltar ae thang skam po'i smig rgyu dag / chur snang chu ni gnyis su med pa ltar //
T02TD2273E:124a-24: bzod nas dag ba btags pa'i yid sangs pa //
T02TD2273E:124a-25: de la rtag chad gnyis su brjod du med //
T02TD2273E:124a-26: yid bzhin nor bu dpag bsam shing bzhin du //
T02TD2273E:124a-27: smon lam dbang gis re ba yongs skong ba //
T02TD2273E:124a-28: de yang 'jig rten tha snyad kun rdzob ste //
T02TD2273E:124a-29: dam pa'i don du 'ga' yang don ma yin //
T02TD2273E:124a-30: do ha mdzod ces bya ba phyag rgya chen po'i man ngag dpal ri khrod pa chen po sa ra ha'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2273E:124a-33: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shr'i bee ro tsa na rakshi tas rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//
